title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Grumman G-21 Goose - receives an EFB
description:
In this video we will have a look at the EFB which will be added as part of Sim Update 12 to the Grumman G-21 Goose. Although it is pretty limited compared to EFB's in other aircrafts it is a nice addition and might be very helpful when flying this aircraft.
